Subject: Clearing out False Positives
Description:
We are re-looking at our results from our data at rest and data in motion tickets. We are wanting to clear out false positives, validate policies, essentially do a crash course for reviewing logs and validating policy. 

I would like one call to review policies in place, and validate things are working. We are still seeing policies not being applied.

I would like a secondary call that will work as a crash course for reviewing and going over results, clearing out bad data. 

Thank you,
What_We_Know__c:
created dictionaries for bank accounts and credit cards to mitigate the false positives
the customer is relatively unhappy with the product as it lacks some features like giving a correct or incorrect "feedback" for report entries, because there are too many false positives and because it's a lot of manual work to set it all up
